title: Lesson 10 - One Minute German
description: In lesson 10 of One Minute German you will learn some useful phrases to impress your German-speaking friends. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute German at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com.

itunes:subtitle: Learn some useful phrases in German
